name: Blocky Snake (itch) (BD Games)
description:
Blocky Snake is an endless game in which you need to avoid obstacles and collect coins. Eat blocks to grow 

length of your snake which helps you smash obstacles along the way. Beat your best score and share with your friends. 

Rewards are there for you every day when you open the game.

Features

Addictive endless gameplay

Smooth control

eye-catching Environments

Endless game

Forest, Snow and desert environments

many snakes to unlock
